import React, { Fragment, useState } from "react"; import "./mainMenu.css"; const MainMenu = (props) => { const [currentMenu, setCurrentMenu] = useState('intro'); const changeToTestPage = () => { setCurrentMenu('lands'); } const changeToIntroPage = () => { setCurrentMenu('grains'); } const changeToMainMenu = () => { setCurrentMenu('mainMenu'); } return (
